Articles.Content:
There's a few contracts (mostly, altitude and orbit acheivements, as far as I have confirmed) that could use a slight rewording.

Currently, "Achieve X altitude" or "Achieve orbit around Kerbin" is the extent. Cool. So, my first orbital craft was unmanned. But the contract didn't complete. Unless this is a bug (if so, please disregard and move to the appropriate place), I am assuming this is because I used a probe to achieve orbit, as well as altitude achievements.

I would ask that these be changed to reflect the intent. As such:

"Achieve X altitude with a manned capsule";

"Achieve orbit around Kerbin with a manned capsule";

These more accurately define the contract fulfillment requirements. I am unsure of whether or not the orbital requirements around other bodies react the same way as of yet, I will test that and update if necessary.
